text: Paul Alexandre Belmondo (born 23 April 1963) is a French racing driver. He raced in Formula One for the March and Pacific Racing teams. He was born in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine. He was the son of actor Jean-Paul Belmondo. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:French Formula One drivers Category:Sportspeople from Boulogne- Billancourt
title: Paul Belmondo
